Title: Airline Management Solutions

Three layers architecture

HomeWiki:
Project Description
Three layers architecture
PHP
Maria DB
Metro-Style

The objective of the project is to implement a web application, 100% free, to manage an airline company.
The front-end layer will be implemented using a framework based on the METRO-style. The business layer using php technology. Finally, the data layer will be implemented using the DBMS MariaDB.

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
